background.background: Born to a long line of financiers who believed commerce was the highest form of piety, Thaddeus was raised among the towering glass temples of San Francisco's financial district. He received rigorous, high-society training intended to mold him into a beacon of corporate virtue, destined to uphold the legacy of his family's wealth and moral standing. However, a deep yearning for adventure and high-seas freedom clashed with his gilded upbringing, setting him on a path of luxurious self-discovery and spiritual confusion.
background.defining_moment: In a climactic, poorly-planned attempt to steal a vintage espresso machine from a rival coffee guild, Thaddeus dramatically slipped on a puddle of oat milk, leading to his capture and mandatory community service as a certified coffee slinger.
background.signature_quote: My oath is strong, but my venti orders are stronger.
background.signature_item: A solid gold, finely wrought tamper for packing espresso grounds
background.signature_pose: Thaddeus stands bolt upright, right hand resting on the hilt of his ornate cutlass, while his left hand holds the golden espresso tamper aloft, catching the light in a professional, almost reverent manner.

face.head_shape: extremely wide and high, almost block-like
face.cheekbones: sharp and high, creating deep shadows
face.cheek_appearance: slightly sunken, perpetually sun-kissed despite his indoor work
face.nose: broad, high-bridged nose that turns slightly downward at the tip, uncommon for his background
face.lips: full and slightly downturned, often forming a slight, worried frown
face.teeth: pearly white and straight, professionally maintained

eyes.shape: deep-set, slightly hooded to convey seriousness

ears.placement: normal human placement, close to the head
piercings: small gold hoop earring in the left earlobe, signifying his Pirate class

hair.color_distribution: natural sun-kissed highlights throughout the mass of hair
hair.style: Shoulder-length straight hair styled into a bizarre, highly sculpted, rigid 'helmet' of perfect locks that frames his wide head and narrow face, kept immaculate with expensive product.
hair.texture: thick and straight, but artificially stiff
hair.volume: thick and dense, contributing to the helmet appearance

head.facial_hair: clean shaven, emphasizing the angles of his jaw
head.overall_symmetry: subtly asymmetrical, one eyebrow is slightly higher than the other

body.posture: rigid military stance, betraying his Paladin discipline
body.flexibility: average, slightly stiff due to armor components
body.skin_tone: warm olive with undertones of golden bronze, reflecting the Maori influence, but slightly pale from city life (Caucasian/Polish)
body.clothing_style: Exotic, high-fashion military-maritime fusion with corporate branding.

torso.chest_size: average, subtly muscular definition visible beneath the fabric
torso.shoulder_width: broad and powerful, exaggerated by armor
torso.waist_size: thin relative to his shoulder width
torso.clothing_upper: A tailored, fitted doublet made of emerald green Italian silk (Starbucks color), overlaid with premium, polished chrome shoulderplates (Paladin element) featuring embossed mermaid logos (Starbucks logo).
chest_accessories: A large, gold-plated breastplate resembling stylized latte art, secured by black leather straps

arms.musculature: lean and wiry, suggesting quick movements
arms.clothing: sleeves of the silk doublet are rolled up past the elbow
arm_accessories: Intricate leather bracers studded with dark green jade, matching the outfit's color scheme

hands.shape: slender fingers, slightly broad palms, suited for intricate work
hands.dexterity_appearance: nimble and quick, highly skilled in precision tasks like latte preparation
hands.skin_condition_hands: soft but with slight calluses on the fingertips from manual work
hand_jewelry: A heavy signet ring bearing a stylized anchor and coffee bean motif
hands.gloves: white silk gloves with reinforced leather palms

waist.clothing_waist: tailored trousers made of deep navy velvet (Pirate opulence), tucked sharply into high boots
waist.belt: A wide, premium black leather belt cinched tight, featuring a massive, oversized brass buckle shaped like a coffee cup
waist_accessories: A scabbard holding an ornate cutlass (Pirate weapon), hanging at the hip

legs.musculature: toned thighs and well-developed calves from standing long shifts and climbing rigging
legs.clothing_lower: navy velvet tailored trousers, tucked in
legs.shoes: Highly polished, knee-high black leather boots with ornate silver buckles (Pirate/Paladin hybrid), crafted from the finest leather.
legs.gait: confident stride, a practiced, slightly exaggerated swagger
leg_accessories: Shin guards made of green enameled metal, subtly integrated into the boot design (Paladin protection/Starbucks color)

body.coat_cloak: A long, flowing cape made of heavy, shimmering black velvet, lined with emerald green satin, draping over the armor plates for dramatic silhouette impact.

visual_design.color_scheme_description: The design is dominated by Starbucks Green (#006633) representing the Barista role and its modern corporate nature. This is contrasted with Deep Black/Navy (1E1E1E) for the Pirate's dramatic flair and the Gold/Brass (FFD700) detailing for the Paladin's expensive, pious dedication. The overall feel is one of expensive, slightly ridiculous corporate zeal.
notable_visual_features: Extremely wide, helmet-like hair volume and large head
Prominent chrome shoulder armor embossed with corporate logos
Knee-high leather boots paired with velvet trousers

equipment: Set of high-quality coffee beans in a sealed, jeweled pouch
A ship's navigational astrolabe modified to also measure milk temperature
